author: Neerendra Chauhan
comment: Till now, Great experience. Customer support is up to the mark. Hope it will continue. 2 stars deducted becoz of return policy for electronic items specially mobile. I have stopped buying high value electronic item.   Further, why don't you guys improve your app. User interface is really poor. Filter doesn't work properly.

author: Prashant Singh
comment: Amazon has a very unique point in having the most PATHETIC and AWFULLY DISGUSTING SERVICE...I am literally tired of its terrible service... Just let me know how to get rid of your GRIP.... That is how to deactivate my account on Amazon... Besides.., I'm anyway going to uninstall your app

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello, apologies for the unpleasant experience. We'd like to know more about the issue and help you with it. Please fill in your details here : http://amzn.to/1qM3OX5. We'll look into the issue and get back to you.

- Amazon Customer Service

comment: Hangs on search screen. Whenever I try to search something it shows results but when you click on any product it just hangs and shows a white screen, I tried reinstalling several times but no avail also it sometimes start showing desktop version​ of Amazon website.  So its pretty much useless for me and I had to use mobile website of Amazon, btw I am using it on Motorola Z2 Play with Android 7.1.1 running.

author: bikas Panda
comment: DO NOT SPENT A PENNY ON AMAZON "PRIME" ... Amazon prime sucks! They promise one day delivery and do not deliver it for three days! And then the inefficient customer service blames the delays on courier partners! Highly unprofessional!

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello Bikas, we are sorry to hear that. We would like to look into this at the earliest and help assist. Could you please write to us at http://amzn.to/21eUWpR with your registered email address, contact and order information. We will get in touch with you soon.

- Amazon Customer Service.

author: salmann shaikh
comment: Worst delivery system by Amazon transportation services, not once not twice for alp my orders of 12 15 items all tracking were wrong none delivered on time, delivery guys are not that responsive... Frustrated... Would prefer aliexpress than amazon..

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello Salmann , sorry about that. We'd like to help you with the issue you are facing with us. Kindly share your details here: http://amzn.to/1qM3OX5. We will check and get back to you on this.

- Amazon Customer Service.

author: Blaise Alphanso
comment: Great app for discounted buys. Only issue is that the search and the filter is not the best. Guess their catalogue management and tagging, along with required filter management needs to be worked upon. And loyalty program? That is not applicable with Amazon (and it is fine, if it isn't there) but why is the question there before I review it?

author: Prashant Mehta
comment: I hate it because  most of the time they deliver defective pieces of product. Again and again i hv to replace..and now they have replacement option for only one time after that they refund my money that too on 3 to 5 days.   PS: Please try to provide good quality product rather than fooling people around.

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello Prashant, we understand that your experience with us was unpleasant.​ We will forward your feedback to our teams internally. Kindly share your details here: http://amzn.to/1qM3OX5. We will check and get back to you on this.

- Amazon Customer Service.

author: Mahim Lagachu
comment: 1.Great customer service. 2.Delivery coverage 3.Availability of wide range of products (almost everything), 4.International import/export. 5. Details of each product with pics, reviews, questions/answers. 6. 'Amazon prime' which I've not tried as I think it can't provide fast delivery to our area ( with India post - the only available courier service here) 7.Delivery by India post are slow as hell, it atleast takes 12/14 days. It takes 3 days to reach Guwahati from Haryana and atleast 8 days from Guwahati(781006) to Majuli(785105)!!  8. Easy return/exchange not available in our area (it's to be self returned). 9. False product delivered for a number of times, lots misguiding product details. ***Still the best online shopping service in the world. Thanks!

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello Mahim, we'd like to understand this better. Kindly write to us with more details from the link here: http://amzn.to/1qM3OX5, we'll get back to you on this.

- Amazon Customer Service

author: Sonali Mandal
comment: It is a good experience to shop in amazon though the quality of  a few bags i purchased last time was not satisfactory. But I personally look forward for ur prompt service...Expecting better in future i would surely continue my shopping at Amazon...

author: Ritu Vashisht
comment: Feed up now.. I am not able to place Cash on delivery order from my account.. called customer care so many time.. yet no solution.. need to find some other online shopping apps placing  order on Amazon gives me headache..

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hi, due to certain regulatory and operational restrictions, we are unable to offer delivery services in some pin codes. But we are working on expanding our services. Appreciate your understanding in this regard. 

- Amazon Customer Service.​

author: Satyajit Gohil
comment: I ordered a Moonwalker cricket helmet in September. Didn't fit, wanted to return. Amazon didn't send a pick up n I was asked to return it by myself. I did that and now the seller can't be reached Amazon does nothing. As I had already paid for the helmet, no refund was made and the product is also sent bank.. Robbers..

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:
Hello there, sorry about that. We'd like to help you with the issue you are facing with us. Kindly share your details here: http://amzn.to/1qM3OX5. We will check and get back to you on this.

- Amazon Customer Service.

author: koel ganguly
comment: The worst service ever. We are fools to invest money in such shopping portals and they take us for a toss and with fake promises give u more hopes for customer satisfaction but what they do is actually raise you up only to disappoint you.  Customer service is poor and product don't reach on time.  Automated messages are a joke.  And refund is once upon a time situation.

reply.author: Amazon Mobile LLC
reply.content:

author: THE TECHNICAL boy
comment: It's really very good because  One day I want a local LED TV i Went many shop I went to cehbbra electronic LG smart led TV cost is 35,000rs then i want to buy another LED then I searched in Amazon shop I saw LG smart led TV at 24,000rs then I told him that it's too cheap then he call his TV solder. then he sold me smart led TV at 25,400rs

author: Sup K
comment: The app is poorly designed - messy, unorganised, no option to choose grid display etc. I lose patience with it fairly quickly. The desktop ebsite experience is better but both (app & website) need a complete overhaul. Take a few pointers from the Jabong app - its interface is seamless and just overall a delight to use.

author: prashanth golagani
comment: Worst application!! no specific details about the product. No clarity in the check out option. It does not even mention the cost n offers unless u go for the payment section 😣😣😣

author: ASHISH KAUSHIK
comment: I am facing an issue. From the last two days, I am trying to buy a "Tenor 10. or D: 2 GB" handset. But I fail everytime. The product gets added to the cart successfully. But when I proceed to checkout, it always gives the following error message: "You added product to cart through the wrong page or did not complete checkout in 15 minutes. Please try again from the sale page". Kindly rectify this issue and notify me at the earliest possible.

author: Devendrasingh Tomar
comment: Worst service i ordered 2 months before dumbell but it has not come yet. I dnt know after how many year it will come. More over i want to cancel order it is not gonna to cancel I emailed to amazon no response. I unhappy at all with this service.

author: Sourav Basak
comment: First the good things - 1.The package amazon provides for prime members is a steal (priority offers, prime video, prime music) 2. The pricing of products are way better than other players. Now the bad thing - The app user interface is not upto the mark. You guys should take lessons from Flipkart in this department.

author: Sanju Podder
comment: The great thing about amazon is the abundance of various types of products of different brands. We feel assured since the price of the product gets updated from time to time. In addition, the shipment and delivery take place in time.

This has happened me me 4 times in a row. Please fix this as soon as possible. Called customer care to report this , but nothing has improved yet.

author: Anurag Pal
comment: Service is satisfactory. But, the look of the app feels outdated. We tend to lose the interest to use the app because of its boring design.

author: Sreejith Parameswaran
comment: The app very good, the products are all there, the communications with regard to delivery etc are good. But I have faced problems with date of delivery on more than one occasion. When you order something looking at the delivery date, Amazon has the responsibility to honour that. Unfortunately I was let down on this more than once. In addition, the last mile service guys (delivery persons) seems to have their own ways of doing things. The 3 stars because of the deficiencies in delivery of items.
